channel.title: Is Possible using Whonix As Proxy Server to my S.O ???
channel.description:
Hi, is possible i using Whonix in my S.O as Proxy Server???
I Have a USB Wireless to using as Isolated WAN in VirtualBox... Is necessary for security??
I Start VirtualBox and configure in my Web Browser Proxy Server Address????

item.title: Is Possible using Whonix As Proxy Server to my S.O ???
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Possible in theory and discussed somewhere. However, unsupported.

Whonix

Unsupported

What do you mean by unsupported?

Read full topic
item.source: Is Possible using Whonix As Proxy Server to my S.O ???
